about_the_game:
Video game enthusiast and moody 13-year-old Diya’s day starts out rough. It’s the late 80s, and on top of the usual teenage angst—school, bullies, cliques, and annoying adults—Diya’s just moved to a new country, has no friends, and her once-close relationship with her brother is souring. Ugh! But when the only light in her life, her beloved dog Beans, vanishes without a trace, and she finds herself trapped in a mysterious time loop, Diya’s day goes from bad to worse.

With her frustrating day stuck on repeat, ending with the same tired question from her parents—“How was your day?”—Diya realises that if she has any chance of saving Beans, she must break out of her comfort zone, confront her fears, use her knowledge of video games, and…gulp…talk to her parents, teacher, and neighbours! As she starts to open up and seek answers, Diya discovers that the residents of Lakeview are hiding secrets and a sinister presence shadows her every move.

Who, or what, is behind the time loop and Beans’ mysterious disappearance? Can Diya break free from the endless cycle and reunite with her faithful companion? And how does the festival of Diwali tie into the unfolding mystery?

Groundhog Day meets Stranger Things in this narrative-driven, point-and-click adventure that brings a supernatural twist to an ordinary teen’s life. Journey through Diya's repeating day, where every interaction could hold the key to breaking the loop and unlocking the truth about Beans' disappearance.

  • Supernatural Time Loop Mystery: Experience a teen's everyday life turned upside down with a sinister twist.

  • Immersive Narrative: A coming-of-age story about family, friendship, and finding light in the face of darkness.

  • 80s Nostalgia: Set in the late 80s, Diya’s world features video games, 80s fashion, a retro soundtrack, and pop culture references that bring the era to life.

  • Engaging Puzzle Solving: Uncover clues and secrets to advance the story while exploring unique and beautifully illustrated environments.

  • Diverse Cast & Setting: Set in the fictional small town of Lakeview, based in Aotearoa, New Zealand, How was your day? features relatable characters and themes of diversity, drawing on Indian, Pacific, and New Zealand culture.

  • 80s-Inspired Mini Games: Progress through challenges and puzzles playing mini-games inspired by 80s classics like Pong, Frogger, Space Invaders, Pacman, and more!

  • Quintessentially Kiwi Setting: Explore a lovingly crafted and beautifully illustrated 80s New Zealand small town, featuring iconic local shops, native birds, and charming natural surroundings that capture the essence of Aotearoa, New Zealand.

  • Beans, the dog.

Minimum:

  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with at least 512MB Shared VRAM & openGL 2.0 support
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: These specs are estimates and may be updated before launch.

short_description: Caught in a strange time loop and with her beloved dog, Beans, missing, 13-year-old Diya discovers that building meaningful connections is key to solving the sinister mystery in this beautifully illustrated 80s-themed narrative adventure. Can Diya break free from the endless cycle and find Beans?
